hey guys quick question...
ok so you know how when you go to create instrument in reason it has "factory sound bank", "orkester Sound Bank", "Documents" and "Desktop"? well iv got some refills and i wanted to know if there is any way i can get them to appear right there along side everthing else... if anyone knows how please please please let me know... itll be greatly appreciated =)

Tucson_Luni520:
In Reason when adding a new instrument in NN-TX for example, click the "browse patch"-icon and
locate the refills you have downloaded. Then simply drag the desired refill left under "locations"
and so you have acces to your new refills.
ok cool thank you very much for your reply much appreciated
what an upload!!! Chosen Wun, you're much appreciated.

Hey,Tucson Luni
Just navigate to the reason program folder and put your refills there. 

Alternately,  if you've got Reason 4, you can use the interface to get to the folder where you have the refills and drag them to the left side of the interface under Documents, Factory Sound... and Orkester.
